name: Escape Space
description:
You’re a mercenary.

Take your spaceship and fight in this horizontal, 2D space shooter!

Fight for and against 3 different factions that have their own units. Gain or lose reputation from them by doing so, which will have a direct impact on the rewards they’ll give you, the market and the prices of the items they sell.

Pick from a good variety of weapons and mods to build your own spaceship’s loadout! Every weapon will have its own firing pattern, whereas every mod will enable a special ability for you to use while fighting in space! Customize your own color scheme and thrusters’ exhaust colors to fight with style.

More? Yes. You can also upgrade your weapons, mods and other systems to enhance your performances! More firepower? More firerate? It's also a yes.

Customize your own spaceship.

In Escape Space, you're the one who decides how the gameplay is. After unlocking new spaceships and weapons from the Supply Depot or by earning them as mission rewards, you can equip any item you want between missions to customize your experience: each spaceship has its own caracteristics and special ability while each weapon does have its own particular shooting pattern. Find out what works the best for you!

Discover 3 different factions.

The outer space is divided in 3 main actors.

The Earth Military Conglomerate is the official government task force in charge of maintaining the Earth’s laws in space. They usually have a good amount of resources when it’s about sending military assets to a conflict zone.

The Void Outlaws is a pirate faction that uses unconventionnal weapons and tactics to fight their enemies. They’re known to aggress civilian convoys to steal their goods, but they also attack militarized fleets to grab some weaponry from time to time.

The Quantum Riders is a technologically-focused faction that expanded in the outer space, conducting various dangerous experimental and usually forbidden activities there. Thanks to that, they have access to some very high-end weapon systems.

You, as a mercenary, will be fighting for your own. Factions might contact your for some specific contract missions where an agile and quick dispatch is necessary, or when they’ll be in a trouble and will require for assistance.

Your choices will affect your relations with the factions: attacking/losing a contract for a faction will hurt your reputation, whereas completing an assignement will improve your standing!

Play as long as you want!

With tens of handcrafted story contract missions, Escape Space will bring you through hours of gameplay. Discover all of the factions’ secrets!

But it’s not all: procedurally-generated contract missions will be available as soon as you finished your first mission, giving you the opportunity to grind for any reputation you would like, weapons or mods!

There’s a “story” end, but it is not your end: keep fighting in the late game against very difficulty procedural missions!

Alone in space?

This is an offline, solo player game: no need to rush!

Play the way you want it, experiment through the hundreds of possible spaceship’s configurations and find what suits you the most!

Play for hours or for 10 minutes: most of the time, you’ll be able to find a contract mission that will be short enough for that!

Pixels everywhere!

Escape Space is made of beautiful, crispy handmade pixel art assets!
